details_required_documents_en: You need to be logged in
privacy_policy_quote:
We store the information described in the section “What information do we collect?” on servers located in the European Economic Area (EEA)
/n Some of our subsidiaries and affiliates, located outside the EU, the EEA, and Switzerland, have limited remote access to your Personal Data
For more information, see the section “How and why we share your information” above
/n We share your Personal Data with service providers, business partners, and other parties described in the section “How and why we share your information” above, who may be located outside the EU, the EEA, and Switzerland
Our service providers are based in Africa, the Asia-Pacific region, Europe, and North and South America
transfer_destination_countries: UE, EEE, Afrique, Amérique du Nord et du Sud, région Asie-Pacifique et Suisse
